entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
